timeline.name: App Developer
timeline.desc: Full-time App Developer training – UX/UI, Dart, Flutter, App Ecosystem & Publishing (2024–2025).

timeline.name: Linux course
timeline.desc: Online Course (Feb–Mar 2022): Linux Command Line – navigation, file and directory management, filters, pipes, and console tools.

timeline.name: Software Engineer Course (TAP)
timeline.desc: Participation in the Software Engineer course from September 23, 2002 to July 11, 2003. Topics included:  programming languages C, C++, Java and C#, Windows 2000, UML modeling, Oracle databases.

timeline.name: Diploma Engineer (University of Applied Sciences)
timeline.desc: Studied from 1988 to 1994 in Automation and Remote Control Technology, with a focus on microprocessors, microcomputers, programming and algorithm languages, electronic components, electric machines, and control engineering.

timeline.name: Diploma Technician (Microprocessors for Machine Tools & Robots)
timeline.desc: Graduated from the Radio Engineering Technical School with a focus on Robotics. Solid knowledge of microprocessor systems for machines and robots. Grade: good.
